Published January 11 2015

Capital One Acquires Level Money

Capital One Acquires Level Money — As if we needed any more hints that mobile is going to be a huge space for payments and money management. I never got fully invested (ha) in Level, but the UI was pleasant, and it seemed like a great way to introduce the concept of budgeting to users.

Enjoy your day.
